This map shows universities in the Atlantic Coast Conference, where the circle size shows the relative enrollment (data from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atlantic_Coast_Conference)
```{r leaflet}
library(leaflet)
acc_data<- read.csv("ACCSchools.csv")
df<- data.frame(lat = acc_data$lat,
                lng = acc_data$lng)
df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(popup = acc_data$Name, radius = sqrt(acc_data$enrollment)/5, weight = 1)
```
